Quickstrike:




Quickstrike paced down the hall, thinking of something to do. There 
must have been plenty, but he couldn't find what wouldn't be too 
boring. 

Taking another turn down his repeated trail, he jumped at the sight 
of a red and white bot. He calmed once he saw it was Terrorsaur.

"Where'd ya come from from?" 

Terrorsaur blinked with an odd look on his face. He pointed to 
him. "Hey, weren't you--"

Quickstrike shook his head. He knew that he was going to say. "No, ah 
faked it!" 

Terrorsaur lowered his arm. "You outta teach me that trick," he said. 
The small Fuzor glared at him with a lowered brow.

"What brings ya here, then?" Quickstrike asked, recalling that the 
flying reptile was with Megatron. "Ah thought ya were Megatron's 
kiester kissers." A grim developed on his mouth plate.

"You little!" Terrorsaur stepped forward, ready to grab him, when 
Quickstrike let his cobra arm hiss. The red and white bot stepped 
back with a frown on his face. Quickstrike chuckled. "I followed 
Tarantulas. Megatron's gang didn't seem like Predacons anymore."

"Oh." Quickstrike took a step back. "Ain't th' same wit'out me, huh?"

"Don't be so full of yourself, half and half."

Quickstrike groaned and eyed the bot harshly.

"I just want to get some quarters," Terrorsaur said.

"Try back there," Quickstrike said, pointing behind himself without 
looking. Terrorsaur nodded and walked past him. Quickstrike turned 
his shoulder to look at him. He spat.
